Card.cardDescription: Attack Range: 1 Effect: During your main phase, you may play any number of ATTACKs.
Attack Range: 2 Effect: Whenever you play an ATTACK on a target hero, ignore the effects of any armor card equipped on that hero.
Attack Range: 2 Effect: Whenever your ATTACK deals damage to a target hero, you may prevent that damage; if you do, choose 2 cards in that hero's hand or equipment zone and discard them.

Attack Range: 2 Effect: Whenever you target a hero of the opposite gender with an ATTACK, before resolving the ATTACK that hero chooses one of the following: 1. The defending hero discards a card from their hand. 2. The attacking hero draws a card.
Attack Range: 3 Effect: Whenever your ATTACK is canceled by a DODGE, you may play another ATTACK targeting the same target hero.

Attack Range: 3
Effect: Whenever you want to play or discard an ATTACK targeting a hero, you may discard 2 cards from your hand and have this be treated as you playing an ATTACK. If the 2 cards are both BLACK, the ATTACK is considered BLACK colored. If the 2 cards are both RED, the ATTACK is considered RED colored. If the 2 cards are different colors, the ATTACK is considered colorless.

Attack Range: 3
Effect: Whenever your ATTACK is cancelled by a DODGE, you may discard 2 cards from your hand or equipment zone; if you do, ignore the effects of that DODGE and deal the damage from this ATTACK.

Attack Range: 4
Effect: Whenever you play an ATTACK targeting a hero, if you have no cards left in your hand, you may target up to 2 additional heroes within your attack range with the ATTACK played.

Attack Range: 5
Effect: Whenever your ATTACK deals damage to a target hero, you may discard an equipped mount from that hero.

Attack Range: 2
Effect: Whenever your ATTACK deals damage to a target hero, if that hero has no cards in their hand, this ATTACK deals 1 additional damage.

Attack Range: 4
Effect: You may treat any of your ATTACK as a FIRE ATTACK.

Attack Range: 2
Effect: Whenever your ATTACK deals damage to a target hero, if that hero has no cards in their hand, this ATTACK deals 1 additional damage.

Attack Range: 3
Effect: During other heroes turns, whenever you play a BLACK card, you may target a hero within your attack range. The targeted hero must play a DODGE, if that hero does not play a DODGE, deal 1 damage to that target.
